TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit CustomLabelsCollection extends System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.ChartElementCollection`1<class System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.CustomLabel>
Public Class CustomLabelsCollection Inherits ChartElementCollection(Of CustomLabel)

span.span: Represents a collection of objects.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 类表示的集合对象，它们反过来表示自定义标签对象可以使用。The class represents a collection of objects, which in turn represent the custom labels that an object can use. 此类公开为集合的属性对象。This class is exposed as the collection property of an object. > [!NOTE] > 你可以自动填充使用的自定义轴的整个标签行标签使用任何方法定义中包括`DateTimeIntervalType`自变量。You can automatically populate the entire label row of an axis with custom labels using any method definition that includes a `DateTimeIntervalType` argument. 属性指示集合中项的总数和通常用于查找集合中的上限。The property indicates the total number of items in the collection and is commonly used to find the upper bound of the collection.

summary.span: 将 对象添加到集合中。

span.span: Adds a object to the collection.

MemberSignature.Value: public void Add (double labelsStep, System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.DateTimeIntervalType intervalType);
.method public hidebysig instance void Add(float64 labelsStep, valuetype System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.DateTimeIntervalType intervalType) cil managed
Public Sub Add (labelsStep As Double, intervalType As DateTimeIntervalType)
public: void Add(double labelsStep, System::Windows::Forms::DataVisualization::Charting::DateTimeIntervalType intervalType);

param.name: labelsStep
param.span: 一个 ，确定自定义标签的绘制频率。

span.span: A value that determines how often the custom labels will be drawn.

param.name: intervalType
param.span: 一个 枚举值，该值确定间隔类型。

span.span: A enumeration value that determines the interval type.

summary.span: 将多个 类型的 对象添加到集合中。

span.span: Adds multiple objects of type to the collection.

summary.span: 使用标签填充轴的整个第一行。

span.span: Populates the entire first row of an axis with labels.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法创建并初始化为整个对象使用的轴的第一个标签行指定类型的标签。The method creates and initializes objects for the entire first label row of an axis with labels of the specified type. `labelsStep`参数确定将绘制自定义标签的频率。The `labelsStep` parameter determines how often the custom labels will be drawn. > [!NOTE] > 必须在调用此特定方法定义之前调用方法。The method must be called prior to calling this particular method definition.

Public Function Add (fromPosition As Double, toPosition As Double, text As String) As CustomLabel
public: System::Windows::Forms::DataVisualization::Charting::CustomLabel ^ Add(double fromPosition, double toPosition, System::String ^ text);

param.name: fromPosition
param.span: 向其应用标签的轴范围的最小值。

span.span: The minimum value of the axis range to which the label is applied.

param.name: toPosition
param.span: 向其应用标签的轴范围的最大值。

span.span: The maximum value of the axis range to which the label is applied.

param.name: text
param.span: 标签文本。

span.span: The label text.

summary.span: 使用给定的轴范围和文本将 对象添加到集合中。

span.span: Adds a object to the collection, using the given axis range and text.
The newly added object.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 将一个自定义标签添加到相关的轴的第一个标签行。Adds one custom label to the first label row of the relevant axis. 使用没有标签标记。No label mark is used. 如果第一个标签行中的任意位置使用自定义标签，为该第一行自动不生成任何标签。If a custom label is used anywhere in the first label row, no labels are automatically generated for that first row. > [!NOTE] > 必须在调用此特定方法定义之前调用方法。The method must be called prior to calling this particular method definition.

MemberSignature.Value: public void Add (double labelsStep, System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.DateTimeIntervalType intervalType, string format);

Public Sub Add (labelsStep As Double, intervalType As DateTimeIntervalType, format As String)
public: void Add(double labelsStep, System::Windows::Forms::DataVisualization::Charting::DateTimeIntervalType intervalType, System::String ^ format);

param.name: labelsStep
param.span: 一个 ，确定自定义标签的绘制频率。

span.span: A value that determines how often custom labels will be drawn.

param.name: intervalType
param.span: 枚举值，用于确定 labelsStep 参数的度量单位。

span.span: A enumeration value that determines the unit of measure for the labelsStep parameter.

param.name: format
param.span: 一个确定自定义标签格式的值。

span.span: A value that determines the format of the custom label.

summary.span: 将多个 对象添加到集合。

span.span: Adds multiple objects to the collection.

summary.span: 使用具有特定格式的标签填充轴的整个第一行。

span.span: Populates the entire first row of an axis with labels with the specified format.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此方法创建并初始化对象轴的整个第一个标签行与指定类型的标签。This method creates and initializes objects for an axis' entire first label row with labels of the specified type. 步骤确定将绘制自定义标签的频率，并可以也指定可选标签格式设置。The step determines how often the custom labels will be drawn, and optional label formatting can be specified as well. > [!NOTE] > 必须在调用此特定方法定义之前调用方法。The method must be called prior to calling this particular method definition.
